Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.component

Interface ISystemBalance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    public interface ISystemBalance
extends IComponent
    The idea of "system balance" is introduced in HamsterEconomyHelper, which says, all fees charged by the system shall be returned to players.

    So a central ledger is necessary for tracking these transactions.

    See https://github.com/NyaaCat/HamsterEcoHelper/blob/master/src/main/java/cat/nyaa/HamsterEcoHelper/balance/BalanceAPI.java
